articles.title: VERIFY: Fact-checking Joe Rogan's false claim about Myocarditis and the COVID-19 vaccine - WUSA9
articles.description: While young men are at higher risk of developing myocarditis, it is still much lower than the risk of COVID-induced myocarditis.
